title: Enemies like You
description: “Do you have no sense of self-preservation whatsoever?” he bites out. “The things I’ve done to protect that man would turn your hair white. Would you really mistake me as your ally? Your friend?”I turn my attention to my pants, snapping myself back up. “I’m not thinking friend, exactly...” I drawl.They're dangerous men. Sworn enemies. And they can't resist each other.Will has never met anyone like Kit. He’s arrogant. Gorgeous. Totally lethal. The most expensive bodyguard money can buy.And Will has never gone to his knees for another man—it’s not his style. But a simple command in Kit's cut-glass accent makes Will want things he’s never wanted, do things he’s never done.Their red-hot chemistry is off the charts. Just one problem: Will has vowed to kill the billionaire that Kit is hell-bent on protecting.And Kit has secrets, too—his own reasons for sacrificing his soul, piece by painful piece, to keep one of the worst men on earth alive.
author: Annika Martin
